    • eat

      public void eat(FoodItem food)
      Description copied from class: Character
      Consumes a food item. Applies effects on hunger, health, and belligerence. Enforces rules about fresh food and consecutive vegetables.
      Overrides:
      eat in class Character
      Parameters:
      food - The food item to eat.
